name: MegaCorp
description:
#gcgj

A game for Game Changer Game Jam 14. Theme: Justice. 

Manage a corporation. Meet your superiors’ expectations at the board meeting, and face the reaction of the media.

Do what makes money or what makes you popular and live with the consequences. 

Lars Kroll - Programming

Björn Aumayr - Art and graphics

Magnus Magnusson - Research and text

Gill Lumer-Klabbers - Research and text, Music

Rikke Badsberg - Programming
